Represents the base class of the player.

Syntax
public abstract class Player<TDeck, TCard> : IPlayer<TDeck, TCard>, IEquatable<Player<TDeck, TCard>>, IComparable<Player<TDeck, TCard>> where TDeck : class, IDeck<TCard> where TCard : class, ICard
Type Parameters
Name Description
TDeck

The type that represents the customized Deck<TCard> for a given game.
TCard

The type that represents the customized Card for a given game.
